   Alex Jones
   stated on December 13, 2017 in a broadcast of the "Alex Jones Show":
   Says there won't be a recount in Alabama because a Democratic judge said
   "we're going to erase all the computer files ... on Wednesday morning."

"Notice the Democrat judge said, ‘Oh, we’re going to erase all the
   computer files after tonight, on Wednesday morning,’ " Jones said.

Our ruling

   Jones said that a recount in the Alabama Senate election was not possible
   because a Democrat judge allowed the state to erase computer files.
